text: Aur musa (alh-e-salam) ney sattar aadmi apni qom mein say humaray waqt-e-moyyen kay liye muntakhib kiye so jab unn ko zalzalay ney aa pakra to musa (alh-e-salam) arz kerney lagay kay aey meray perwerdigar! Agar tujh ko yeh manzoor hota to iss say qabal hi inn ko aur mujh ko halak ker deta. Kiya tu hum mein say chand bey waqufon ki harkat per sab ko halak ker dey ga? Yeh waqiya teri taraf say mehaz aik imtehan hai aisay imtehanaat say jiss ko tu chahaye gumrahi mein daal dey aur jiss ko chahaye hidayat per qaeem rakhay. Tu hi to humara kaar saaz hai pus hum per maghfirat aur rehmat farma aur tu sab moafi denay walon say ziyada acha hai
